recipesJson.name: Too Tall's Strawberry Milkshake
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: This is just my rendition on a strawberry milkshake or strawberry cream. What ever you want to call it it is good. The flavors pretty much speak for themselves. Pretty much everyone has a recipe close to this. It's just a good concept and or flavor that tastes great.

reviews.text: This recipe is delicious, the combo of creamy yogurt and malted milk is a great idea and works very well for a milkshake note. Great job bro, keep up the good work.
